casebody.data:
HARDY v. WARDEN OF THE MARYLAND HOUSE OF CORRECTION [App. No. 147,

September Term, 1965.]

Decided June 27, 1966.

*676Before Hammond, Hornly, Marbury, Barnes and McWilliams, JJ.

P®r Curiam.

For the reasons set forth in the opinion of Judge Harlan in the lower court, the application for leave to appeal is denied.

Application denied.
